meanings.sent1: Don't be a fathead and forget your keys at home.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the fathead for not paying attention in class.
meanings.sent3: The fathead tried to use a fork to eat soup, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a fathead when it came to accepting help.
meanings.sent5: Being a fathead in this situation will only lead to trouble.

meanings.sent1: The baby had a chubby fathead that everyone found adorable.
meanings.sent2: The knight's helmet barely fit over his fathead.
meanings.sent3: The fathead of the statue made it look comical rather than majestic.
meanings.sent4: His fathead made it difficult for him to find a comfortable hat.
meanings.sent5: The fathead of the giant statue towered over the town square.

meanings.sent1: The class clown often played the role of the fathead in school plays.
meanings.sent2: His friends teased him affectionately for being a lovable fathead.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit a square peg into a round hole, he felt like a fathead.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a fathead when she couldn't solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Being a fathead in this situation will only lead to trouble.
